name: Celadon Theme
author: Alif Naufal
description:
A dark theme inspired by the muted, matte finish of classical ceramics.

Celadon layers cheerful, milky pastels over a deep jade base. It provides a high-contrast yet eye-friendly environment designed specifically for long-form coding sessions. Crafted for discerning developers who appreciate a workspace that feels like a quiet studio.

Key Features

  • Matte Palette: Reduced glare with a focus on organic, ceramic-inspired tones.
  • Soft Contrast: Carefully balanced syntax highlighting to prevent eye strain without sacrificing clarity.
  • Universal Compatibility: Fully compatible with all IntelliJ-based IDEs.
  • 100% Free: A passion project designed for fellow artisans.
